text:
ClearMetal | ONSITE San Francisco, CA | Engineering, Design, Sales | Full-time | https://clearmetal.com

ClearMetal is a predictive logistics company using machine learning and AI to unlock unprecedented efficiencies for global trade. We offer a data-first approach to add transparency to container shipping with the ultimate goal of end-to-end supply chain visibility. We're based in SF and funded by Prelude Ventures, Eric Schmidtâ€™s Innovation Endeavors, NEA, PSA Unboxed, DCLI, SAP.iO, and the founders of GT Nexus and Navis.

We're currently hiring for:

  - Frontend Engineer
  - Backend Engineer
  - UX / UI Designer
  - Sales Development Representative (SDR)
Our stack:

  - Backend: Python3, Flask, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ
  - Frontend: Javascript, React, Redux, Flow
  - Data Science: Jupyter, Sklearn, Pandas, NumPy, SciPy
  - DevOps: AWS, Terraform, Docker, Salt.
View our job postings at https://clearmetal.breezy.hr

If you're interested in any of the roles or ClearMetal and have questions, shoot me an email -- tyler@clearmetal.com
